question: You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell how you feel. Write a letter to the singer. In your letter:say how you feel about his performancegive details of your musical activitiesexplain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities.
text: I am a huge fan of your music and I am completely engrossed whenever I listen to your albums. Luckily, I was present at your concert which was held on 10th March at the carnival festival in Mumbai and as expected you delivered a breathtaking performance. To be honest, I have enjoyed it thoroughly.

I am an aspiring musician and have been playing the guitar since I was ten. Along with playing the guitar I used to sing in my school choir. Moreover, I won the award for the best performer of the year during the annual function of the school when I was in grade 11 and my performance was appreciated by everyone at that time. In fact, I have been a member of a local music band called "Window of Dreams" for the last six years.

I am sure you are terribly busy, but if I get an opportunity to perform with you, it would be a dream come true for me. I can play the guitar in the background or sing in the chorus. I am prepared to give an audition anytime if I receive a call and you can contact me at 8746736478.
Thank you for your consideration and I look forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Along with playing the guitar. Consider adding a comma.
